title: How to instantly access 18k+ free geospatial datasets
summary: This post provides information on how to access a large number of free geospatial datasets and discusses improving the discoverability of geospatial data.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because it mentions "geospatial datasets" which is relevant to "Spatio Temporal" and "Contextual dataset", but it doesn't focus on point processes or survey data.
